column4: Can anyone help me restore mp3 playback functionality to rhythmbox?
PLEASE, someone! I've been here asking periodically since 2PM, can *anyone* help me fix mp3 playback in rhythmbox?
I haven't tried any others- I put ap ost in the forums with all the details here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=795534
I would try to completely remove ubuntu-restricted-extras, and installing it again
I think so. I use synaptic for it all :P
there's an option there for "complete removal"
I would keep trying to reinstall the ubuntu-restricted-extras package for getting rhythmbox (gstreamer) to work. I can't help you with your synaptic problem though
have you installed the "ugly" plugins as well? and the "multiverse variant" of both bad and ugly?
I saw those listed, but didn't know if I should get them or not...
those are more codecs, maybe mp3 is in there. I would just install ubuntu-restricted-extras and have them all tbh
aha, ok. then the "ugly" and "bad" codecs should already be installed, as restricted depend on those
